skill.name: opentrons-integration
skill.description: Lab automation platform for Flex/OT-2 robots. Write Protocol API v2 protocols, liquid handling, hardware modules (heater-shaker, thermocycler), labware management, for automated pipetting workflows.
skill.summary: Lab automation platform for Flex/OT-2 robots. Write Protocol API v2 protocols, liquid handling, hard...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: This skill contains only documentation and protocol templates for the Opentrons lab automation platform. No data theft, exfiltration, or malicious execution patterns were detected. All Python code follows the official Opentrons Protocol API v2 specification.

content.user_title: Build Opentrons protocols for Flex and OT-2
content.value_statement: You need reliable protocol templates and API guidance for Opentrons lab automation. This skill provides ready-to-use templates for PCR setup, serial dilution, and liquid handling on Flex and OT-2 robots.
actual_capabilities: Generate Protocol API v2 scripts for liquid transfer and pipetting operations
Create PCR setup protocols with thermocycler module control
Build serial dilution workflows across 96-well plates
Control hardware modules including heater-shaker and temperature modules
Define labware layouts and deck configurations for Flex and OT-2
limitations: No runtime validation of labware or module availability
Templates are examples and do not include comprehensive error handling
Does not integrate with external data systems or LIMS platforms

use_cases.title: PCR setup automation
use_cases.description: Draft a PCR preparation and thermocycling protocol for Flex or OT-2.

use_cases.title: Serial dilution workflows
use_cases.description: Generate a serial dilution script with defined volumes and mix steps.

use_cases.title: Protocol onboarding
use_cases.description: Provide a clean starter template for new Opentrons users.

prompt_templates.title: Starter protocol
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a basic Opentrons Protocol API v2 template for OT-2 with one transfer from A1 to B1 and clear comments.

prompt_templates.title: Serial dilution
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a serial dilution protocol across one row with 1:2 dilution, 100 uL transfers, and mix after each step.

prompt_templates.title: PCR setup
prompt_templates.prompt: Draft a PCR setup protocol that distributes master mix, adds 8 samples, and runs a 35 cycle thermocycler profile.

prompt_templates.title: Module control
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a protocol that uses a temperature module for incubation and then transfers samples to a plate for analysis.

output_examples.input: Make a PCR setup protocol for 8 samples on Flex
output: Loads thermocycler module and PCR plate in slot D1
Distributes master mix to 8 wells with p300 pipette
Transfers template DNA from reagent tubes with mixing
Runs initial denaturation at 95C for 3 minutes
Executes 35 cycle PCR profile with denaturation, annealing, extension
Performs final extension at 72C for 5 minutes
Holds at 4C with lid open for plate removal

best_practices: Specify API level and robot type in metadata for compatibility
Use protocol.comment for clear execution logs and debugging
Always simulate protocols before running on physical hardware
anti_patterns: Hardcoding labware names without verifying deck layout compatibility
Using volumes that exceed pipette minimum or maximum limits
Skipping tip usage planning for long multi-step protocols

faq.question: Is this compatible with both Flex and OT-2 robots?
faq.answer: Yes. Set robotType in requirements to Flex or OT-2 and use compatible labware names for each platform.

faq.question: What are the main limitations of these templates?
faq.answer: They are example protocols. Production use requires validation, error handling, and labware-specific testing.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with LIMS or external data systems?
faq.answer: Not directly. You would need to extend the templates to read input files or call external APIs.

faq.question: Does this skill access or transmit my experimental data?
faq.answer: No. The skill generates local Python scripts that run entirely on the robot or simulation environment.

faq.question: What if my protocol fails during simulation?
faq.answer: Check API version compatibility, verify labware definitions exist, and ensure volumes are within pipette limits.

faq.question: How does this compare to the official Opentrons documentation?
faq.answer: This skill provides focused templates and compact API reference for quickstarts. The official docs remain the comprehensive source.
